Sentencas: Solution infiltration is a popular technique for the surface modification of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) cathodes.
Titulo: A dynamic infiltration technique to synthesize nanolayered cathodes for high performance and robust solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, the synthesis of nanostructured SOFC cathodes by infiltration is a tedious process that often requires several infiltration and high temperature (>= 500 degrees C) calcination cycles.
Titulo: A dynamic infiltration technique to synthesize nanolayered cathodes for high performance and robust solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Moreover, fabricating large-area nanostructured cathodes via infiltration still requires serious attention.
Titulo: A dynamic infiltration technique to synthesize nanolayered cathodes for high performance and robust solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Here, we propose a facile and scalable urea assisted ultrasonic spray infiltration technique for nanofabrication of SOFC cathodes.
Titulo: A dynamic infiltration technique to synthesize nanolayered cathodes for high performance and robust solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is demonstrated that by using urea as a precipitating agent, the calcination after each infiltration cycle can be omitted and the next infiltration can be performed just after a drying step (<= 100 degrees C).
Titulo: A dynamic infiltration technique to synthesize nanolayered cathodes for high performance and robust solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Finally, the precipitates can be converted into a desired catalyst phase in single calcination thus, a nanostructured cathode can be fabricated in a much faster manner.
Titulo: A dynamic infiltration technique to synthesize nanolayered cathodes for high performance and robust solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is also shown that the low calcination temperature of the cathode (<= 900 degrees C) can produce highly durable SOFC performance even without employing a Ce0.9Gd0.1O2 (GDC) diffusion barrier layer which provides the ease of SOFC fabrication.
Titulo: A dynamic infiltration technique to synthesize nanolayered cathodes for high performance and robust solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: While coupling with an ultrasonic spray technique, the urea assisted infiltration can be scaled up for any desired cathode area.
Titulo: A dynamic infiltration technique to synthesize nanolayered cathodes for high performance and robust solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3 nanolayered cathode was fabricated and it was characterized by scanning electron microscope (SEM), X-ray diffraction (XRD), and transmission electron microscopy (TEM) techniques.
Titulo: A dynamic infiltration technique to synthesize nanolayered cathodes for high performance and robust solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: SEM showed the formation of a nanolayer cathode just after 5 cycles of the urea assisted infiltration while the XRD and TEM confirmed the phase and stoichiometric uniformity of the similar to 100 nm cathode nanolayer.
Titulo: A dynamic infiltration technique to synthesize nanolayered cathodes for high performance and robust solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The effectiveness of the newly developed technique was further verified by the stable operation of a GDC buffer layer free SOFC having an active cathode area of 25 cm(2) during a 1200 h durability test.
Titulo: A dynamic infiltration technique to synthesize nanolayered cathodes for high performance and robust solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The research outcomes propose urea assisted ultrasonic spray infiltration as a facile, scalable, and commercially viable method for the fabrication of durable nanostructured SOFC cathodes.
Titulo: A dynamic infiltration technique to synthesize nanolayered cathodes for high performance and robust solid oxide fuel cells

Titulo: A dynamic infiltration technique to synthesize nanolayered cathodes for high performance and robust solid oxide fuel cells
